website_summaries.verdict: If hair that smells fabulous is just as important to you as adding bounce and fullness, chances are you will be impressed with this thickening shampoo.
pros: Has a fantastic scent, as it contains botanicals including tea tree, peppermint, sage, and lemon
Gives fine hair a fuller appearance
You don't need to use a lot for noticeable results
cons: May make hair that tends to be coarse or dry feel worse
A few users complain about breakouts
Leaks and broken pumps are common concerns

customer_reviews.title: Gives my scalp a clean feeling, but does not thicken hair
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting this product to act like hair restoration treatment but was hoping it would give the appearance of a thicker, fuller head of hair which it did not. Its siimlar to other salon shampoos in that its ingredients are of higher quality but if you have thinning hair like me, don't expect it to make it look like you are wearing a racoon skin cap on your head after using it for a month. Also, I have a very dry scalp in the winter time and noticed that this shampoo doesn't help with that at all (although it is not an anti-dandruff shampoo).

product_meta.description:
Size:33.8 Fl OzLemon Sage Thickening Shampoo is the perfect way to thicken strands for a clean and healthy look. The formula provides a boost of volume, while also helping to protect against split ends. Strengthen every strand while you enjoy the lemon, sage, peppermint and tea tree aromas.

BRAND STORY
Tea Tree is botanical hair care from John Paul Mitchell Systems—the leader of salon-quality products that is committed to the professional beauty industry. Every purchase supports JPMS salons with a commission.
